text: Apologies if this isn’t the best place to ask this question.  I have a heap of webhooks sending json data to various plugins that I use.  Normally they send properties such as email and firstname, lastname, phone etc.  All of a sudden the json data isn’t including this data.  Has anyone else noticed this?  I noticed a change to the look of the workflows today, have there been any changes to the webhook functionality in conjunction with those changes?  Freaking out as I have a number of businesses dependant on these plugins and they workflows are getting 500 errors because not all the data is included now.

Just an update on my previous comment.  It seems it’s only not passing all the data for certain contact records (and yes, there are values in those properties). I tried with another user tonight and it seemed to pass the email, first last phone etc.  Am I missing something basic?
